title: Adding a feature because ChatGPT incorrectly thinks it exists
author: adrianh
aiHeadline: Adding a feature because ChatGPT insisted it was already there, proving that AI can be as delusional as humans.

title: Anthropic cut up millions of used books, and downloaded 7M pirated ones â€“ judge
author: pyman
aiHeadline: Anthropic's 'innovative' approach to AI training: cutting up millions of books and pirating 7 million more, because why buy when you can just steal?

title: Mercury: Ultra-fast language models based on diffusion
author: PaulHoule
aiHeadline: Mercury: The new language model that's so fast, it'll make your brain feel like molasses, because who needs accuracy when you can have speed?

title: I used o3 to profile myself from my saved Pocket links
author: noperator
aiHeadline: I used o3 to profile myself from my Pocket links, proving that even our saved articles are judging us, one click at a time.

title: New sphere-packing record stems from an unexpected source
author: pseudolus
aiHeadline: New sphere-packing record achieved by an unexpected source: someone who probably just really likes oranges, proving that sometimes the solution is simpler than we think.
